Title: Sainsbury's to cut 3,000 jobs and shut cafés

Title: Postcards From The Border aims to challenge dominant portrayal of U.S.-Mexico border
Description: Challenging perceptions of the US-Mexico border: A new Texas art project uses music, photos and storytelling to highlight the the rich cultural tapestry beyond headlines of migration and enforcement

Title: REI names former Nike, Athleta exec to be next CEO amid company struggles
Description: REI named Mary Beth Laughton, a former leader at Nike, Athleta, and Sephora, at the company's next CEO after Eric Artz retires in March.

Title: Nondisclosure agreements are now rampant in the workplace, covering nearly half of employees
Description:
Nearly half of employees have to sign NDAs for their jobs, a new study finds.
But the binding agreements are not applied equally by race or gender.

Title: Forget weight. Why you should measure progress by non-scale victories
Description: An NSV is a non-scale victory, a sign that you're making progress toward a weight-loss goal that has nothing to do with your weight or BMI.

Title: Firefighters Battle With New Rapidly-Moving Fire North of Los Angeles
Description: Firefighters fought to maintain the upper hand on a huge wildfire that swept through rugged mountains north of Los Angeles.

Title: Gen Z is turning this CEO's business model upside down

Title: Celeste devs cancel lush platformer Earthblade to focus on smaller-scale projects

Title: My Climate Protest Arrest Shows the Problem with ‘Social Tipping Point’ Theory

Title: After buying out its mobile business, Google acquires parts of another HTC unit
Description: Google has bought parts of another HTC division, coming years after the company acquired most of HTC's mobile unit.
